# controlSize

**Instance Property**

The size of the scroller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var controlSize: NSControl.ControlSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

Valid values for `controlSize` are described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/ControlSize-swift.enum] (`NSCell`).

## Determining Scroller Size

- **scrollerWidth(for:scrollerStyle:)**: Returns the width for scrollers of the receiving class for a given control size and scroller style.
